w4160.engine.graphics

Class OBJLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • w4160.engine.graphics.OBJLoader

  • public class OBJLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the method that loads an .obj file and returns a Mesh instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Mesh loadMesh(java.lang.String fileName)
      The method reads an input .OBJ file and returns a Mesh instance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • loadMesh

        public static Mesh loadMesh(java.lang.String fileName)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        The method reads an input .OBJ file and returns a Mesh instance. The input .OBJ file may contains vertex positions, texture coordinates, and vertex normals.

        Note: In the given .OBJ file, the number of vertices, the number of texture coordinates (if provided), and the number of vertex normals (if provided) must be the same.

        Parameters:
        fileName - file name of the .OBJ file.
        Returns:
        a Mesh instance representing the loaded mesh.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the given input file cannot be read successfully.
        See Also:
        Mesh
